data.name: Demon Slayer -Kimetsu no Yaiba- The Hinokami Chronicles: Core Add-on Bundle
data.detailed_description:
Core Add-on Bundle Content

  • Character Unlock Keys – Kimetsu Academy Nezuko Kamado, Kimetsu Academy Zenitsu Agatsuma, Kimetsu Academy Inosuke Hashibira
  • In-game Costumes – Butterfly Mansion Patient Wear for Tanjiro Kamado, Zenitsu Agatsuma, Inosuke Hashibira
  • Avatars Set of 10
  • Kimetsu Points (8,000 Points)

※The Avatars Set of 10 includes the following: Zenitsu Agatsuma Avatar, Inosuke Hashibira Avatar, Giyu Tomioka Avatar, Shinobu Kocho Avatar, Kyojuro Rengoku Avatar, Sakonji Urokodaki Avatar, Sabito Avatar, Makomo Avatar, Murata Avatar, Tanjiro Kamado (Hinokami Kagura) Avatar
*Character Unlock Keys allow immediate access to play as the indicated characters in Versus mode.
*The content/specs may change without warning.
*Kimetsu Points can be exchanged for in-game rewards. (8,000 Points can unlock access to 2 characters.)
*In-game Costumes can be used in Versus mode.
*The items included in this set are also available in Demon Slayer -Kimetsu no Yaiba- The Hinokami Chronicles Digital Deluxe Edition. Please be careful about duplicate purchases.
*To use this content, the base game (sold separately) is required.
*This product will only be available for the West.

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 | AMD Phenom ll X6 1100T
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660, 2GB | AMD Radeon HD 7950, 3GB
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 | AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 760, 2GB | AMD Radeon R9 280, 4GB
